locale.message: Open Access Statistics (OA-S)
The OA-S plugin transforms OJS into a data provider for the Open Access Statistics (OA-S) project.
OA-S Reporting
This plugin implements reports based on OA-S metrics.
Opt Out
You successfully opted out from usage statistics collection. While you see this message no statistics will be collected from your usage of this site.
Privacy Information
Read more...
We log anonymous usage statistics. Please read the privacy information for details.

If you click the opt-out button below then your browser will receive an "opt-out cookie" and no statistics information will be collected at all as long as this cookie is present in your browser. The opt-out information will be stored for one year and will be renewed for another year whenever you access OJS. The cookie contains no information that may be used to identify you. Please note that if you are using a different browser or if you delete cookies from your browser then you'll have to opt-out again as we'll not keep any personal information about you on our side to protect your privacy.
Settings

The OA-S plugin requires access to a SALT server to pseudonimize IP addresses. After registering your OJS installation with the OA-S project you'll receive a username and password from University Library Saarbrücken (SULB). Please enter these login credentials here so that you are able to use the plug-in.
